keyToStrMap.0: Her name is Stella and she is the station master.
keyToStrMap.1: The station has been very chaotic lately! Lots of late trains, lots of lost passengers.
keyToStrMap.2: This is because the trains use a strange carriage labelling system. Each train carriage is labelled with a part of a word. Passengers must look for these labels in order to find their seats.
keyToStrMap.3: Trains need to be labelled soon after they arrive. Otherwise passengers won't find their seats and the trains can't leave on time.
keyToStrMap.4: Mr Biggles used to help Stella by doing the train labelling, but heâ€™s not so good at it anymore. Stella hopes I can help her, and help the station return to normal!

keyToStrMap.Full:
Stella the Stationmaster

Occupation:
[] Stationmaster (previously cabbie)

Likes:
[] Driving fast, painting distant train locations

Dislikes:
[] Waiting in line, being hot

Favourite quote:
[] From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My best friend April

How I came to be here:
[] Died of boredom waiting in line at the supermarket.

What I wish:
[] To one day find April sitting on the train
